entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
